basic.description: This course prepares students to work with developmentally disabled and autistic individuals. Topics include issues in assessment and intervention, improving language capability, preparation for community placement, and the treatment of severe behavior disorders.
basic.subject: EAB
basic.title: Behavioral Analysis in Developmental Disabilities and Autism

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EAB 3703 and EXP 3422 (or equivalents) or instructor permission.
